extendedInfo.description: If you are Eminem's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Eminem's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Eminem's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Eminem's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features-------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums-------------------------------- - Infinite- The Slim Shady LP- The Marshall Mathers LP- The Eminem Show- Encore- Relapse- Recovery-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 313- 2.0 Boys- 25 To Life- 3 A.M.- 3 Verses- 50 Ways- 8 Mile- 8 Mile Freestyle Pt.II vs "Lotto"- 8 Mile Freestyle Pt.III vs "Papa Doc"- 8 Mile Freestyle vs "Lickty Spilt"- '97 Bonnie And Clyde- A Drop In The Ocean- Almost Famous- It's Ok- It's Your Time- Jealousy Woes II- Jimmy Crack Corn- Just Don't Give A Fuck- Just Lose It- Just Rhymin Wit Proof- Just The Two Of Us- Ken Kaniff (Skit)- Kill You- Kim- Like Toy Soldiers-
